document.full_text: it would make sense for portugal to seek aid from the european union bailout fund, although such a decision will be caught up in domestic politics, european central bank governing board member ewald nowotny said.
document.title: would make sense for portugal to seek aid: nowotny
lines_and_colors: it would make sense for portugal to seek aid from the european union bailout fund, although such a decision will be caught up in domestic politics, european central bank governing board member ewald nowotny said.
